name: Preecha Chanapai
description: '''Preecha Chanapai''', also more widely known by his [[stage name]] '''Lek Carabao''' ({{langx|th|ปรีชา ชนะภัย, เล็ก คาราบาว}}) is a Thai musician and singer, who is the member of [[Carabao (band)|Carabao]], a famous and popular [[Thai rock]] and ''[[Phleng phuea chiwit]]'' (Thai [[protest song]]) band.
